titleStmt.title: A coffin for the Good Old Cause; or, A sober word by way of caution to the Parliament and Army, or such in both as have prayed, fought, and bled for its preservation. Written by an affectionate friend to it and them
titleStmt.author: Spratt, Thomas, fl. 1659, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Spratt in the Wrenn Catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
